name: Sudoku+Relax
description:
A prototype of a relaxing sudoku puzzle game. At the moment there are just the bare basics, you can play sudoku at varying levels of difficulty, and listen to relaxing music, courtesy of Bensound (https://www.bensound.com/). Later instalments will have more music, perhaps a timer/score, and a system which will allow players to choose what background noise and images they'd like!

ALL UNDER DEVELOPMENT :)
